item.title: Qbs 1.19.0 released
item.description: The Qbs build tool version 1.19.0 is available. Qbs is a community-driven language-agnostic build automation system. It is fast and offers an easy-to-learn language based upon QML. What’s new About 151 contributions went into this release since version 1.18.0. We have selected a few items below. Have a look into the complete changelog if you are interested in more details. Codesign module A new codesign module that implements code signing for Apple, Android and Windows platforms has been added.
